message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I've got to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $125 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll offer it to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short. I'd be willing to pay $125 for the product, but that's as low as I can go.
